document_data.name: Allesian
document_data.mainbody:
'''Allesian''' was a language spoken by the inhabitants of [[Thesk]] and [[Ashanath]], the region southwest of [[Lake Ashane]], from [[Kront]] in the north to the [[River Umber]] in the south and from [[Telflamm]] in the west to the Plateaus of [[Thay]] in the east.{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|26}}

It was a [[Raumtheran languages|Raumtheran language]], just as [[Rashemi]], which was spoken to the northeast. It had two dialects, Ashane and Golden Allesian.{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|29}}
